name: TheMorningDaily
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The Morning Daily is a great flash briefing to start your day. The Morning Daily offers one finance tip and one headline every morning. This flash briefing is updated daily Monday-Friday. 
TMD covers a range of topics that include news updates, money and markets, entrepreneurs, science, tech, health & lifestyle.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
